website_summaries.verdict: Great for customers needing a highly-rated desk organizer specializing in filing.
pros: 5 vertical, open-faced, stand-up trays for filing and paperwork
cons: Filing trays are shorter than some customers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer so much I purchased a second. I was looking for something to contain files and papers but yet could be used to place my printer on top of. Its very sturdy and supports the HP printer without any issue, weighing approx 4-5 pounds itself. The bottom has rubber feet that prevent sliding and scratching of the desk top. I purchased with the intent of only using the bottom half and honestly would love the option to buy without the top.
customer_reviews.author: fairy_diva

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated stacks of paperwork on my teacher desk! 😊
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for my desk! I'm a special education preschool teacher and so I have LOTS of paperwork. I also am often busy with the kids and so papers get stacked, then kids often end up knocking things off my desk, which presents its own challenges. 😊 This is perfect for eliminating both of those problems. My paperwork is still right at my fingertips but organized and out of the way. Great product and highly recommend for teachers like myself!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schock

customer_reviews.title: The best quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th or 5th Deco Brothers project I have purchased and I love every one from this desk organizer, to the the pencil holder, to the over the door hanger. These days when everything is made of flimsy plastic, it is nice to know somebody out there is still making a quality product, and at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: It looks like what it is - a cheap desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: This isn't going to fool anybody into thinking you've spent a ton of money on it. It looks like what it is - a cheap desk organizer. However, It snaps together easily and serves its purpose well. I'm able to hold a redweld folder in each of the top sections without any bending, tipping, or other issues. The shelves on the bottom section hold a good amount of paperwork. It wobbles a little bit and doesn't sit entirely flat, but that's a hazard of a metal piece like this. It isn't a big enough problem for me to notice with regular use, though. Overall, it helps keep my desk significantly more organized. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJ jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organizer, 4 Stars for Functionality & Zero Sta for Damages
customer_reviews.text: The only mode that comes with Stacking Sorter Sections facing front. (If side-way, we won't see what's lining up and sorted.) Arrived in the product box (not contained in an Amazon box). 10~15 minutes to assemble. Nice to have "extra" parts that snap Tray and Sorter together. (Thank you very much!) 4 Stars for the scratch (see the photo). (Usually, "arrived damaged" would earn 1 Star.)
customer_reviews.author: Member Since 2010

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to organize some piles of paper on my desk. (My desk is really a table which does not have drawers either) This was easy to put together and is perfect for organizing my papers so I can promptly handle tasks. I got a 2nd one with the top perpendicular where this one it is parallel to the bins. I love them. They also seemed a bit more reasonable in price than some other choices.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoman

customer_reviews.title: Solved my desktop organizing problem...
customer_reviews.text: The search for the perfect desktop organizer is over. This is it. The GOOD: - easy assembly - well-made - solves organization problems The BAD: - there isn't any OVERALL: after 2 1/2 years of use, I haven't found a single thing I don't like about this organizer. It solved my desktop organizing problem, keeping my most important files at my fingertips. It was easy to assemble and has stood the test of time. I would purchase this unit again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mtn Guy

customer_reviews.title: but overall sturdy and perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: some assembly required, and MUCH bigger than i thought, but overall sturdy and perfect for the office!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and makes OPTIMAL use of space.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Pleased with my purchase, just wish the dividers were a little taller. This unit was relatively easy to assemble and is a perfect fit for the space - so - with this product, I'm making OPTIMAL use of my space. Plus, it sits in front of my shredder. So, from time to time I have to move it to empty the shredder. Everything stays in place with NOTHING falling out! Kudos for a product well done.
customer_reviews.author: Eve in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: it's actually a 2for1
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for my use, it's actually a 2for1, as I kept the 2 main parts separate ... it's very sturdy... if there was one small improvement that I would make, would be to add some mesh to the bottom of the letter/mail holder part, so smaller items wouldn't fall through, otherwise it's perfect, and priced appropriately ... delivery was fast, and packaging was solid..thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fuerst

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I have tried years to find an organizing idea that actually stuck. This has done it. I’m in medical administration. I have a folder for every day of the week and put them on top. I keep my “to do” stuff in the bottom and when done put it in one of the folders at the top. At the end of the month I file everything I a file cabinet then repeat the process. It’s eye level so it’s lirera staring me in the face so it’s easier for me to stay focused. Great quality and the set up is awesome. Hope this helps....
customer_reviews.author: MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as you'd expect. It's sturdy, too. It's not flimsy. If you've ever been in an office, this is exactly what they usually have as common desk organization stuff. Just make sure you measure your space correctly so you have room. I have a small desk for my home office and this just fits.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A super great item. It was just what I was needed for my desk. Everything is organized better thanks to this little folder holder. If you are looking for a great organization peice for your home or office this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect to reduce desk clutter. I am a realtor and I keep files for each of my buyer-clients so the rack on the top is perfect for me to quickly grab a file and go! The storage below is great for documents i want to keep handy or for papers I will later scan into my computer and then later shred. Very easy to put together looks clean and has fantastic storage!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pick for "pilers"
customer_reviews.text: I'm a "piler" who needs to see stuff (versus a "filer"), so for me, this is a great way to keep a lot of things visible. This organizer is also handy for things I use often or things I need to do something about that week. I bought two because I also am managing affairs for my parents and I wanted to keep those items separate in my office. But the most surprising reason I gave this a 5-star rating? The packaging. Instead of a gargantuan box with a whole bunch of extra air cushions, the package simply included the two organizers. What a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: MplsKate

customer_reviews.title: The file rack could be better
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my desk at work! The only issue I have been having is the gaps for the files seems to be a little too large. When a file is placed in the first gap on the rack, it seems to fold over and almost look like it is falling. Wish the rack was the same height from front to back and a little skinner in the gaps so that files would stay up but I am keeping this product.
customer_reviews.author: ashley oliver

customer_reviews.title: Simple Setup, Very Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Put this sucker together in about 5 minutes flat. Came out really well! A lot of times these things can be flimsy or wobbly but that wasn't the case with this guy. Everything snapped right into place and it gets the job done! My girlfriend thinks I'm crazy because I like to keep everything so organized -- even she thought it was a useful little organizer. Now if I can only get her to use it! :D
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teacher desk
customer_reviews.text: The DecoBros Mesh Desk Organizer with Double Tray and 5 Stacking Sorter Sections was easy to assemble. The file folder brackets are wide enough for several file folders or 1-2 full file folders. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rsb2

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer is the perfect size for my desk and holds everything I need to have accessible each day. I'm very happy with the purchase and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: laramielady

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile organizer. It is sturdy, looks good and helped me organize my documents on my desk. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ossie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this really helped me organize my desk! Holds a lot of stuff and is made of good quality! I use a shelf for my big calculator and other things, another shelf for all my post-it notes etc, and of course all my folders on top. Can easily hold 15 folders. Or 12 folders and some mail etc.. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Just receoved. Little assembly to attach the top and was easy. Using it to organize paint supply and the top/vertical portion to hold my canvas panels while drying. Happy with purchase and wish I had ordered this one for my office. The metal is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Starz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk organization!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and exactly what I needed! The pieces easily snapped together, and it’s very sturdy. I have stuff all over my desk and this is amazing at keeping it all under control. I was even able to stick a cute magnet on the front!
customer_reviews.author: Emo79

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was better than expected. Well made and easy to put together. You can use the file folder holder separate from the bottom part if you want but I have it together as pictured. The mesh is solid and sturdy; not cheap metal. Big enough to hold my texts laying down. If I needed another I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: John Saller

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required but not much and works great. Note
customer_reviews.text: Some assembly required but not much and works great. Note: The top file holders will not immediately look like the picture but remember you are able to slide them. A little movement and they look just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jadeon

customer_reviews.title: This unit is great, and I'd order it again
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great, and I'd order it again. The only design adjustment I'd make would be to increase the "height" of the two "trays" as if I use the space for post-its or a stapler, it's difficult to get to anything in the back of the space. I have to remove the "front items" to use the rear space.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! It has helped keep my desk orderly. Just the right number of places for files, mail and loose papers. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organize your little heart out with this excellent double tray, file holder.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of my work in the living room. When I am finished, I pack up the paper work and supplies and put everything away in this very useful desk organizer. I know where everything is, and yet it is all out of sight. This is a very useful tray for those who find being organized takes good planning and good tools.
customer_reviews.author: H. Porton

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Useful for my desk at work. Helped to organize multiple things. Takes up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Great setup
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I didn't anticipate having to put it together. But I found it once it was not together was pretty easy to assemble. I now have it on my desk and I has ample storage. I have found the spaces between the dividers are large and so my folder start to bow over, but if you put more than one file folder in it they will stand up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is exactly what I needed to clean up my desk space. The file folder section is removable from the tray base, but I prefer to use them together. The tray is large enough to fit a couple of notebooks or binders. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: keemsters

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver and organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy space saver. We have a tight area to work in and I found that raising everything up kept the necessary things visible and reachable and much more organized. It was a great value for the money. Requires a little bit of assembly but it isn't hard. The other people in the office really appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue123

customer_reviews.title: Droopy folders
customer_reviews.text: I really liked in beginning. However 6 months later the front two rows of files have dropped over almost in half. The metal separators don’t seem to be tall enough to make everything stay neat and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Study & Neat 👍
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this organizer! It holds the thickest, heaviest book I have. Everything is easy to access now and it's very study. It came with 2 extra pieces which I appreciate incase I lose or break one of the little clips holding it together.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described and perfect for my needs. Lots of storage space without taking up the entire desk!!! Very sturdy and even rubber feet so it does not scratch my desk top!!! Definitely Recommend and would buy from again! Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Crognali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Fax station!
customer_reviews.text: The DecoBros Mesh Desk Organizer is perfect for organizing papers by the fax machine. Spaces in the lower double-tray to put the Cover sheet and fresh blank papers, while the five section file holder is used to organize outgoing fax. The item came on time and well-packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that which it's designed. Easy to put together and very sturdy. I'm very pleased with it and would recommend this company and it's products.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney SuGaR

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer. Fits a lot of stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: works incredibly well. Easy to put together and has exposed the top side of my desk. Great organizer. It does measure 18.5" in height with folders in it just in case you are trying to put it under a shelf but if it's for the top of your desk or on a bureau, you'll be fine
customer_reviews.author: J. Sterlin

customer_reviews.title: Desk Organizeter
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hard to get together but work fine
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I use it a little differently and tier the files I am working on in priority order, First slot is "Time sensitive" items, bottom slot is completed tasks and ready to file. Saves a lot of room on my mid size desk, is easy to assemble, and very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect organizer try for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect organizer try for me! I conduct weekly meetings with parents of students, and it is great to get all of the folders set up for each day. It is a little tall, but I love the extra space underneath that I use for all of my files that I need to take care of. It really helps an unorganized girl get a little more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was hard getting the tops on but it’s sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent space saver
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my mom's home office. I really like the compact desigh. A lot of things can find homes in this organizer. The assembly was easy; about 3 - 5 minutes and it was done and it seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Orchid XXX

customer_reviews.title: Decent Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: It's a good organizer, but the vertical separators are a little short and let typical manila folders flop over the top. The lower trays are quite handy though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the corner of my desk and helps keep my desk organized.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Tormey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tricky
customer_reviews.text: One less star due to the fact that it was tricky to put together; didn't realize it would come unassembled. As usual these days, the "instructions" were just cryptic pictures that were difficult to discern. I eventually got it put together: wrong the first time, then finally right.
customer_reviews.author: pigcoon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy for my office. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgoodforsure

customer_reviews.title: Organization
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to organize my home desk
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, looks good and holds a lot of items ...
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, looks good and holds a lot of items of different shapes and sizes. As I had hoped, it has helped to tame an unruly desktop.
customer_reviews.author: D. A Giacalone

customer_reviews.title: I love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Deco organizer !!! It is great to have all my important papers so close at hand and it takes up so little space. It was very easy to assemble and I totally love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and they are excellent for my grandchildren’s Distance Learning supplies. The organizers are sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: southerngma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful product to help keep you ORGANIZED. Love it for my home and work office. I am so busy and therefore picky about things I buy to help me stay organized and do my job better. I do NOT like clutter, it wears me down. A clean, organized office helps and invites you to work better.
customer_reviews.author: NG - A Real Comment

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer saves space on my tiny work desk and holds so much! I was hesitant to try it because I didn't think it could handle all the thick files I need to keep at my fingertips. I'm glad I ordered it; its sturdy and assembles easily. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: I love the drawer for keeping current projects close
customer_reviews.text: It was so inexpensive! It holds a big monitor. I love the drawer for keeping current projects close. And the tray on the side for keeping notepads handy. It is also very sturdy. And the right height. My keyboard slides under it and is out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Turner

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Overall im pleased with this organizer. It does require some assembly but it is fairly easy to put together. My only complaint is that its a little bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Pkelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use this everyday. It holds everything i need at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Debby DeHooge

customer_reviews.title: Organized at last!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is as sturdy as others said it was, and easy to assemble. It allowed me a way to get rid of piles of stuff on my lovely old desk and get things organized. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: DecoBros Mesh Desk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was great. I bought it for my husband's cluttered desk. The shelves and upright file/mail holders do a great job of neatly separating important documents. It is also not too big and doesn't take up too much space. It was a great price plus it looks good. The Prime 2 day shipping is always a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Divina G.

customer_reviews.title: DecoBros Mesh Desk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS ORGANIZER. Was a little dismayed with the amount of assembly, but I managed to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Dubec

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have finally organizes my desk with the help of this product. It holds so much and you can easily see where everything is and access it with ease. I'm going to get another for my father he needs to get organized also. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: and it's perfect! We put receipts in envelopes at the top ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my retail job; and it's perfect! We put receipts in envelopes at the top along with reward signs up we got through out the day. On the bottom we put our schedules to give to associates and other important print outs! It's great for our cashwrap!
customer_reviews.author: megan smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what my desk needed - space for files and 2 shelves for clutter on my desk. Love it. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my desk. It is sturdy and the see through mesh helps me see if anything got pushed to the back. On top there is room on the sides of the file folder holder for a stapler and tape. What I like about it is everything is within easy reach of one arm instead of spread along the back of my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Hen Mac

customer_reviews.title: Handy Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I was able to contain all my clutter into one organized area. Now I have more work space and I can find what I need easier. I also appreciated that in putting this together I got at least one extra clip for each section and that it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: ... this product to get my desk organized and I love it! I am able to organize all my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to get my desk organized and I love it! I am able to organize all my papers and folders right in front and at eye level so I don't forget anything ! Lots of spots
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Witt-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome organizer!! It looks great, is very sturdy, and is easy to put together. It's totally worth the price. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: This organizer is exactly as described and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is exactly as described and very easy to assemble. The top part even comes off if you are just looking for the shelf part. It's great and exactly what i was looking for. It shipped promptly and I started using it immediately. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but works well
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy, the paper trays are the solid base with the folder holder sitting on top. Its just a tad bit too small but should work out ok. It would have been perfect if it had been another 3 or 4 inches wider.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. I couldn't figure out how to use the clips that we're supposed to secure the racks :-(
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Valuably Office Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great desk organizer! Saves much space. Sturdy. Simple functional design. Little pricier than I'd have liked, but worth it in value.
customer_reviews.author: Salamandrea

customer_reviews.title: great way to separate and keep patient charts scheduled for ...
customer_reviews.text: Placed this in front desk area of an office.. two providers in office.. great way to separate and keep patient charts scheduled for the day organized
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: I love this Mesh Desk Organizer with Double Tray
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mesh Desk Organizer with Double Tray. It's save my space looked neat and orderly. I received it on time and the product is easy installation by myself. All the information described on the website are matched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Helps me keep my desk alot more organized, sturdy and functional. Saves space too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: effective but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A nice organizer--I was able to file away most of the contents of a big spread-out desk space in this compact little structure. Don't expect very high quality, though: one of the little metal joints snapped as soon as I started putting it together. Had to repair with super glue
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized organizer. I just downsized my office and this organizer fits perfectly on my new desk. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Needs a lot of clearance on top
customer_reviews.text: Organizes stuff extremely well. Just a lot taller than I expected. The measurements do not take into account the size of the file folders so with those in it, it hardly fits in the space I have it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: love it my organizer is the best in my office ...
customer_reviews.text: love it my organizer is the best in my office I have files at my fingers tips.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernLady

customer_reviews.title: File storage
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space to put all my files and more
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this sits on my desk (limited space)
customer_reviews.text: as a master student I need to be very organized. I love the way this sits on my desk (limited space), and matches my other pen organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper 17

customer_reviews.title: Piece was broken when I received and so I can’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece was broken when I received and so I can’t attach the top sorter. Didn’t have time to deal with returning so I use them as two separate pieces
customer_reviews.author: AriesYoung04

customer_reviews.title: No-tool assembly was great!
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and assembled without having to use tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Look at the picture. It shows there are different levels. NOT! It is failed advertizing!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine marin

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: All of my office binders fit perfectly on top and fit on my desk exactly how i wanted it to
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: Bottom serves as laptop organizer
customer_reviews.text: I use only the bottom section to organize my laptop. The docking station and travel cords go on the middle shelf, and the bottom shelf serves as an inbox for my papers. Very functional with a small footprint on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Works great for quilt studio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my quilt studio to organize quilt rulers, books and designs. It's perfect! Nice and sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: The organizer is sturdy and does what I need
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is sturdy and does what I need. I am hoping that it will help me on my never-ending quest to become more organized!
customer_reviews.author: jenny8675309

customer_reviews.title: Very useful organizer. I am able to use the base ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful organizer. I am able to use the base with the shelves in my kitchen & the top organizer in my office. They can be used together but I have chosen to use them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product that hold plenty of materials!
customer_reviews.text: The spaces between the files both on top and bottom are quite wide, so if you like to keep one folder per section, probably not the right thing for you, but it does hold a lot. I really like that the top filing spaces are tiered, so I can see all of the file tabs in a glance. It's also great that the filing is vertically stacked, which saves me some desk space. Great, sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but once assembled it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble no instructions had to go on YouTube to figure out how to put it together. Otherwise very sturdy holds what I need in place and lots of room
customer_reviews.author: ms.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the durability and quality of the project. Helps with organization and keeps things neat and available
customer_reviews.author: Deannac11

customer_reviews.title: A great desktop organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep some of the debris off my desktop. A decent produce, compact and well thought-out. Arrived undamaged and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Irwin

customer_reviews.title: It serves it purpose
customer_reviews.text: As far as assembling it's not really hard. I just don't have a lot of experience assembling office equipment. I would recommend buying it. Its is serving its purpose and I have had no problems or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: so upwards is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer has helped immensely in keeping my desk neat & tidy. Couldn't get anything vertically or horizontally to help, so upwards is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C. Maley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my desk
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this organizer and it has made my desk super neat. One star off because the structure arrived bent a little
customer_reviews.author: Shaun NR

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functional.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. I would actually love to have or find a pullout basket for one of the shelves, for those little things. It looks great, seems to be made well and matches my decor perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this desk organizer is great i can all my papers in the tray perfectly great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy and it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it might be too high but after using it for a week, i like that my folders are standing and easy for me to grab. I also like having such large spaces to put my documents.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Huang

customer_reviews.title: All I need for my teacher cart
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, this is a great organizer. I use it on my teacher cart, to take care of all my paper needs. Paired with a smaller pen holder, its all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartzy

customer_reviews.title: Classic, sturdy. A must-buy.
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer is substantial. It's classy-looking, and is very sturdy. Assembly took less than 5 minutes, and it looks great on my desk. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my tray!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble even for me. Just what I needed.
